text:
Uladzimir Ivanavich Zhuravel (;; 9 June 1971 – 18 November 2018) was a Belarusian professional football player and coach. He played for the national team from 1992 to 1997. He was born in Semipalatinsk, Kazakh SSR. In 2018 he was a head coach in Shakhter Karagandy. He made his professional debut in the Soviet Top League in 1990 for FC Dinamo Minsk.
Zhuravel died from cardiac arrest on 18 November 2018 in Minsk at the age of 47.
